name: Distant Delivery
text: Your phantom can deliver spells at a greater range than usual.
prerequisites: Phantom class feature, phantom with the deliver touch spells ability.
benefit: The distance from you at which your phantom can deliver touch spells increases by 20 feet.
text_zh: 你的魅影能够在比平时更远的范围传递法术。
prerequisites_zh: 魅影（Phantom）职业能力，魅影具有传递法术（Deliver Touch Spell）的能力。
benefit_zh: 当你通过魅影传递接触法术时，你与魅影之间的最大距离增加20尺。
